content.text:
# Draft:List of presidents of Georgia Tech

List of Presidents of the Georgia Institute of Technology outlines the individuals who have served as the president of the Georgia Institute of Technology since its establishment. The president is the chief executive officer of the university and is appointed by the Board of Regents of the University System of Georgia.
List of presidents
